Your podcasting Sidekick

Streamline your creative process with our platform, effortlessly transforming your ideas into polished content. Engage audiences, manage production seamlessly, and elevate your content from concept to completion.

Taking your Content from Ideas to Production

Replace a dozen tools with a feature set that helps you manage your content, cohosts and audience

Curate Anywhere, Collaborate Everywhere

Capture and organize ideas easily with our Chrome plugin and inbox. Engage your audience in topic collaboration, transforming your podcast into a community-driven project.

Audience-Powered Content Creation

Deepen listener relationships by letting them suggest and vote on content ideas, making your episodes more engaging and community-focused.

From Ideas to Episodes

Turn ideas into episodes with ease using our tools. Coordinate with co-hosts, track progress, and schedule content, all in one place.

Runsheet Mastery

Create runsheets to guide your recordings, ensuring consistency. Automatically generate detailed show notes from these plans, boosting engagement.

Engage and Grow

Involve your audience in shaping your podcast, using their ratings and topic contributions to refine content and build community.

Smart Promotion Tools

Use AI to find trending topics and create hashtags, helping your podcast reach new audiences and grow more effectively.

Works with all your favorite technologies

As a co-host constantly juggling ideas and schedules, finding a platform like this has been a game-changer. It's incredibly user-friendly and not technical at all, making it a breeze for me to store and organize ideas from everywhere. What truly sets it apart is how effortlessly I can collaborate with my fellow co-hosts. We've been able to streamline our workflow, moving from a heap of scattered ideas to a structured, weekly podcast schedule. It's simplified our entire production process, allowing us more time to focus on creating content that resonates with our audience.
